plot: A documentary about the traditional way of life in a Hungarian Lovari gypsy community in Békés county. The film orients around the romani kris /gipsy law/, a tradition that is believed to be extinct in present-day Hungary.
title: Amari Kris
plot_es: A documentary about the traditional way of life in a Hungarian Lovari gypsy community in Békés county. The film orients around the romani kris /gipsy law/, a tradition that is believed to be extinct in present-day Hungary.
